answers.answer: Have you asked her what she did with your stuff?
Oops sorry never mind saw she threw it in the closet. ..
It was sweet of her to try to help....rather she did it right or wrong...it wasn't a life or death to get it done when you just got out the hospital. ..it could of waited
Not very helpful of her at all! Sorry :(
I wouldn't be happy at all! I like things a certain way and I'd rather have things done the right way the first time. It was a fairly nice gesture but I wouldn't be happy about it

Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. I am sure your aunt just wanted to help out, but the truth is that nobody can do the preparations for us exactly how we want to.Do not stress yourself and just try to rest.Keep us posted on your progress. Good luck!

I know she was tryin to help but it still wasnt very nice to throw it in the closet :p i didnt think i was doing to much i just was hanging cloths n puttin others where they go :p i just got so light headed i almost passed out so now im in bed waitin till its time to go to the dr :p i shouldnt of done that stuff but my mother instincts kicked in n it urked my nerves n i had to fix it lol
Bk home... contracting but not enough to dialate me more. Just suposed to stay in bed n rest

I'm so sorry about that. Size 2 really? Lol. Well grab the size 1 box open it and just switch the diapers? Also see if you other half or mom or someone will come over and you sit in a chair and direct them. I have a few friends/family that have done that with me so things could get done when I couldnt.

Take care of yourself and don't stress too much. Yes, that is an idea to just have somebody over and direct them with the stuff you want done.Regarding the diapers, I was telling my husband he needs to go and get a few packs of Nr. 1's because we already a lot of 2's. I am on home bed rest for the 3rd week now (high risk of preeclampsia and refused hospitalization, now almost week 37 so almost there) and he came home yesterday evening from work really cute with some roses for me and 2 more packs of Nr. 2's :)

question: Well im 34 weeks n i was in the hospital acouple days having contractions :p.... while i was gone my aunt took it upon herself to come get the room ready for the baby. I thought it was fine when i came home but as i looked around half my stuff was missing n most the stuf that was out was 0-3 month and the diapers she opened were size 2... so im not suposed to be up more than ten mins but my nesting kicked in and i had to go threw and re arrange all the stuff she messed up.. she just threw half of it in my closet... really????? Now im laying down n im hurting so bad in my back n im pretty sure its back labor cause its commin on with contractions :/ grrrrrr
title: thats not very nice :p
